channel.title: systemd on Jürgen Gmach
channel.description: Recent content in systemd on Jürgen Gmach

item.title: How to View Log Entries Using Systemd
item.description: Until very recently I was lucky enough to have real log files, but now I have to use systemd’s way to view logs. show all log entries journalctl show nginx' log entries journalctl -u nginx directly jump to the latest entries journalctl -e -u nginx
